sentences: Tule ka, ronime siit ülesse. Mis sa nii kaua magad, tule ülesse!
Kas saate kuiva loo täna ülesse?
context: Ülesse is an Estonian adverb that means 'up' or 'to the top'. It indicates movement toward a higher position. The word shows the elative case (movement from somewhere) and suggests upward direction or climbing action. It's commonly used when telling someone to get up after sleeping, when encouraging someone to climb somewhere, or when referring to moving upward in general.
